code: export const getTotal = items => items.length > 0 ? items.map(item => Number(item.total)).reduce((acc, currentValue) => acc + currentValue) : 0;

sourcesContent:
export const getTotal = (items) =>
  items.length > 0
    ? items
        .map((item) => Number(item.total))
        .reduce((acc, currentValue) => acc + currentValue)
    : 0;
